name: Baycentric
tag_list: wordpress-web-design-and-development, custom-websites, seo-search-engine-optimization, wordpress-multisite, full-service-website-planning, graphic-design, ecommerce, content-writing--editing, real-estate-firm-website-design, sf-seo, sf-web-design, san-fra
overview:
Baycentric gives business a distinct competitive advantage by providing cutting-edge web development and internet marketing solutions.

As a full service web development and internet marketing firm, Baycentric is able to accomplish seamless integration of rich media designs, powerful and easy to use functions, all delivered with a solid results internet marketing campaign to deliver high traffic and conversion. For over 10 years Baycentric has served hundreds of clients producing profitable websites because we listen to our clients to understand their needs and ensure results they want. The Baycentric Team is made of specialized members who bring a variety of expert knowledge to each component of our projects.

Baycentric Services: WordPress, WordPress Multisite, SEO (Search Engine Optimization), SEM (Search Engine Marketing), Custom Websites, Graphic Design, HTML5, CSS3, MailChimp, Drupal, Magento, eCommerce, Cloud Hosting
